snippet.title: Armed with Wings: Rearmed - Out Now!
snippet.description:
June 1st 2017 - Armed with Wings: Rearmed is out now on Steam! The stylish, black and white platformer exits early access after 2 years of beta

Armed with Wings: Rearmed is a 2D Action / Platformer rebirth of the original 2008 Flash Game where you command both a swordsman and his companion eagle. 

With the power of both sword and wings - journey through 40 hand crafted levels brimming with thoughtful puzzles and challenging adversaries. King Vandheer resides in his castle waiting for your arrival. Execute the divine order and destroy the tyrant king.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Game Website: 
► http://www.armedwithwings.com/
Steam Page: 
►http://store.steampowered.com/app/340580/

Follow Armed with Wings on social media
►http://www.twitter.com/armedwithwings/
►http://www.facebook.com/armedwithwingspage/
